name: Footprints Festival

config_properties.name: Footprints Festival
config_properties.description: A curated discovery festival at TivoliVredenburg in Utrecht, showcasing emerging international artists across diverse genres.

ai_profile:
**Footprints Festival 2026: A Celebration of Global Sounds and Diversity**  

The 2026 edition of Footprints Festival brings together an eclectic lineup of 11 artists, showcasing a rich tapestry of genres and cultural influences. From electronic beats and psychedelic vibes to traditional Iranian melodies and Malian desert blues, the festival celebrates a wide spectrum of global sounds. With standout genres like electronic (3 artists), psychedelic (2 artists), jazz (2 artists), and indie pop (2 artists), Footprints offers something for every music lover. The festival’s average artist rating of 7.73 reflects a high caliber of talent, with most performers earning scores between 8 and 9, signaling a lineup that promises to impress.  

Diversity is at the heart of Footprints Festival, with artists hailing from 10 different countries, including Germany, Turkey, Brazil, and Nigeria. Notably, 7 out of the 11 artists identify as people of color, highlighting the festival’s commitment to amplifying underrepresented voices in music. Gender representation sees male artists in the majority (8), but the inclusion of female (2) and mixed-gender (1) acts ensures a variety of perspectives on stage.  

This year’s Footprints Festival is not just a celebration of music but also a reflection of the world’s cultural richness and interconnectedness. With no DJs on the lineup, the focus is on live performance, allowing attendees to experience the raw energy and authenticity of each act. Whether it’s the experimental sounds of minimalist electropop or the nostalgic grooves of 80s-inspired music, Footprints 2026 promises an unforgettable journey through sound and culture.
